# ui-tab-list



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Container for tab triggers

## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                   | Type                                  | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `stretch` | `stretch` | Whether tabs should stretch to fill container | `boolean`                             | `false`     |
| `variant` | `variant` | Visual variant                                | `"default" \| "pills" \| "underline"` | `'default'` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                      |
| ---- | -------------------------------- |
|      | Default slot for ui-tab children |
